actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-475, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4704 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against the bill and against its consideration are waived. The bill will be considered in the House. After passage of H.R. 4704, it shall be in order to take from the Speaker's table the bill S. 2482 and consider said bill in the House. All points of order against consideration of the Senate bill are waived. It shall then be in order to move to strike out all after the enacting clause of S. 2482 and to insert in lieu thereof the provisions of H.R. 4704 as passed by the House and to move to insist
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 116.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 193 (Roll no. 67).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4704) to remove the limitation on the availability of funds previously appropriated to the Resolution Trust Corporation.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4704 (availability of funds previously appropriated to the Resolution Trust Corporation).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4704) to remove the limitation on the availability of funds previously appropriated to the Resolution Trust Corporation.
